text: Marigina Alatalaa falan ni ito ra, a naxa: Habadan Ala nan n na, n bata n kɔlɔ n yɛtɛni. Bayo yɛɛrati mi n ma yamaan masuxuma, e yi lu alo xuruse rabeɲinxine, bayo ganle fuma n ma yamaan ma, e lu alo burunna subene balona, bayo n ma xuruse rabane mi sigaxi n ma xuruseene fendeni, bayo xuruse rabane e ɲɔxɔ luxi e yɛtɛ nan gbansan xɔn, e mi n ma xuruseene raba,
